attributes.review:
I, as a 74 year old Donald Trump Supporter, decided it would be an excellent app to download to support my amazing president. Now, I am not like those kids who are always on their cellphones and I am not too good with technology. But my lack of tech knowledge was NOT the downfall of this app. I opened the app and it then said 𝗔𝗥𝗥𝗘𝗦𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗖𝗢𝗣𝗦 𝗪𝗛𝗢 𝗞𝗜𝗟𝗟𝗘𝗗 𝗕𝗥𝗘𝗢𝗡𝗡𝗔 𝗧𝗔𝗬𝗟𝗢𝗥 !! I, as an idiotic racist Bunker Boy lover, did not like this and I did not even know what it meant!! I’m assuming it’s something important,
though. Then! I got an ad that said 𝗔𝗖𝗔𝗕!! Now, again Im not sure what this quote means but I’m assuming it’s something important because I love my president Donald, and I don’t think he’d say anything bad. After that, I went into one of the pages (I don’t know the correct word; again, technology is not my hobby) and it said 𝗡𝗢 𝗝𝗨𝗦𝗧𝗨𝗖𝗘, 𝗡𝗢 𝗣𝗘𝗔𝗖𝗘!! What is this buffoonery?? I exited the app AT ONCE and then i got a screen on my iPhone that said 𝗗𝗘𝗙𝗨𝗡𝗗 𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗣𝗢𝗟𝗜𝗖𝗘. I was incredibly confused as you can imagine and it was very disorienting, especially for an older folk like me. When I saw these disgusting reviews I thought it was one of those silly jokes made by the children of Generation Z, but after looking at this app, I, a 74 year old, can confirm it is NOT! I knew those kids were up to no good when they messed up our rally (which I unfortunately could
not attend because i had to water my eggs), but this is NOT A PRANK BY THEM. 0/10 app. PLEASE take it off the Apple Store. Disgusting.
attributes.title: WORST APP

attributes.review: definitely did not mean to click one star

attributes.review:
Let be real here all the reviews here are childish, but I want to make it real period. Why would someone want a orange 🍊 hookah looking Cheeto puff 🤡head as a president, sure he may look tasty 😻😼🤤but thats not the point don’t judge a book by it’s a cover😉, but for Donald Dankin Dumpster triumph u can🤪. I mean he’s orange and we all know his hair is from the stuff on a corn😎, but beauty should not be to judge but it’s still ok for Donald Dankin Dumpster triumph. Anyways as I was downloading this app I realized that they have to many terms which are probably some black magic 😳🤫😼a secret society only for orange supporters of our president i was one too but here me out. Are we all human, according to scientific studies we are but for Donald Dankin Dumpster triumph we aren’t, he puts us in groups based on color, race, religion, culture, but yet when it comes to WHITE AMERICAN CITIZENS doing crime, and much more they are human, for instance when white American citizens gun down a school there not considered terrorist but non Americans are. Most of all look at 2020 what do You see I see something resembling trash, he can’t even control a virus and was being racist all about it I mean even to consider all of us HUMANS into different races is disturbing and disgusting, most of all trust me  he doesn’t support BLM as a fact he supports ALL LIVES THAT AREN'T AMERICAN DONOT MATTER. Also quick reminder he supports Israel and Israel is selfish and doesn’t want to admit that the country is actually for Palestine free Palestine ❤️.                    So far do you still love this beautiful president of ours. Make America great again more like make America suffer more than it has ever suffered because I’m president and I can do whatever I want also I love to catfish 😌. Lastly I want to ask you, if u were to show empathy which I know u wouldn’t because ur a supporter and racist but would u like this happening to you, people judging, stereotyping, and accusing you of things u didn’t do because of ur color, race, culture, religion well I know ur lovely president loves to, that’s all for now, am I typing this review at 5:00 am because I had a dream of trump 🥵🐔 that’s a secret I’ll never tell ,xoxo, orangechettopuffjskebzhsjdbdbdbd
Bye bye falicia 🥰😌🥔🤧🤡🦾⛄️❤️🦶🏻👁👄👁
